Metadata: Abalone workshop II: An educational workshop on current developments in abalone enhancement projects and the aquaculture industry
Summary of presentations, Susan McBride and Paul Olin, eds., Bodega Bay, California, December 2, 1995.
Summary of presentations and list of participants

Topics covered at this workshop, and summarized here, include (1) design of culturing barrels, (2) land-based grow-out systems, (3) the permitting process, (4) marketing/econo​mics, (5) diets, (6) abalone infestations, and (7) current research efforts.
